source.content: At least 12 dead in terrorist attack at satirical magazine in Paris. Our live blog: http://t.co/FjgQjRzNaM http://t.co/XilbJcDuc0

comment.content: @BuzzFeedNews @BuzzFeed Prayers for France! USA SUPPORTS FREEDOM OF THE PRESS!
